short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Prevent accidental interactions with your production, staging or testing systems by displaying a warning for specified pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Seamlessly identify the system you're currently on and avoid accidental interactions with your production, staging, or testing environments.

Features:
‚óè Customizable warnings
‚óè Multiple domains can be specified per stage
‚óè Support for Regex expressions

Increase productivity and prevent mishaps with this indispensable tool üìà.

This plugin is perfect for anyone who interacts with multiple pages simultaneously, including developers and consultants.
